142231.content:
You have no idea where you are, and, at this point, only the vaguest recollections of how you got here. Eyes softly closed but ears perked and nostrils gently twitching, you try to figure out what's going on. A strange smell meets you; the organic scent of your quietly humming visitor superimposed on an undertone of anti-septic and cleaning agents, accompanied by the hammering and probing of industrial lighting against your lids. A ...Prison? A hospital?

You can feel matting reassuringly soft under your prone and reclining form -but any calming side affects of your comfortable repose are hopelessly overshadowed by the sensation of the leather straps fitted snugly over your wrists, ankles, thighs, and just below your bust. Why were you tied up? Had you been kidnapped? It's all so hazy...

Even greater cause for alarm finds you with the sensation of your visitor gently undoing the buttons low on your blouse, humming and giggling femininely as the cool air breaths over the bared skin around your navel. That area had always been a particularly sensitive spot, you recollect wearily, and you didn't appreciate having it exposed, but you resolve to keep up the pretence of sleep until-

A finger prods the tender skin immediately over your navel, and you flinch, jaw clenching as an involuntary gasp leaves you and the point of contact flares, before you forcibly relax, refusing to stir. You had to act asleep. Slowly, you belly relaxes from where it had sucked in -just in time for another gentle poke into your belly that causes your hoof to kick and your nose to flare.

It was shocking, incredible, the power of one little finger, a message brought home as more pokes land on your midriff, each blow seeming to wrench your body's control ever farther from your own conscious mind. You force yourself to breath normally, even as your eyes tighten like bolts and your cheeks redden. To your frustration, air puffs in and out of your jaws involuntarily as the wretched tickling wears on, grinding at your willpower like a glacier wearing down a mountain. Dammit, you hated being so ticklish!

"Wakey, wakey, little horsie." Says your tormentor sweetly, giggling as your charade fails with ever greater obviousness. You swear you can smell her smirk, as she pokes with two fingers perilously close to your bellybutton, making both legs kick spastically, each hoof gaining almost a quarter-inch before the strapping rebukes them. "Aw, is someone just a widdle bit twicklish? Tickle tickle!"

Shut-up! Shut-up! You think, chest heaving ever faster as the intolerable sensations build. It'll take more than tickling to make you wake up; sooner or later she has to get bored and leave. She has to. Abruptly, you feel more cool air caressing your body, and crack an eyelid to see two delicate beige hands unbuttoning your jacket still further. More of your curvaceous belly is rapidly bared, ending just below your ribs, with a red hint of your bra visible under one of the last remaining buttons.

Out of your right eye, opened surreptitiously, you see the hand draw back, assuming a pointing gesture, one nail slowly descending on your skin once again. You don't know whats worse; being able to see the attack coming or not, even as that dreaded finger makes contact, dragging straight down your abdomen, prompting an unavoidable gasp and -dare you admit it?- a giggle. Breath, breath, just breath, aaand the finger's back to the top of the triangle of exposed skin, dragging down again, over your trembling flesh and lightly spasming muscles. It's all you can do not to scream.

"Wow, little horsie. You sure are receptive! How can you stand it, to be so ticklish?" In fairness, you don't know how you can stand it, either. "Gee, widdle horsie, it must be a nightmare. The thought, every day, of someone finding out how horribly ticklish you are. Of someone exploiting your ticklish little belly to break through that big, strong, tough facade of yours, to reduce to you to a helpless laughing mess. And show everyone that you're nothing but a ticklish little horsie." She uses her voice like a stand-up entertainer, highlighting each and evert part of her speech differently to drive home the message. Coupled with the merciless, measured tickling, the effect is devastating.

What's wrong with this bitch? Why won't she leave you alone? No, all she does is giggle to herself as she strokes down your belly, over and over again, each inexorable stroke driving you one step closer to the brink. Sweat breaks out as you struggle to keep up some kind of composure, tail whisking back and forth beneath you as you fight to ignore the rippling feelings on your tortured midriff. You will not give her the satisfaction of seeing you lose control! You can't!

Suddenly, the path changes, the finger leaving off its long stroking to focus once again on your lower belly. The circe closes relentlessly, trailing flaming nerve endings, steadily zeroing in on -oh, no. Not there. "Ahahahahahahaahahahah! Okay! Ohhohohahahahahakkkahyahayhay! I'm awake! I'm awake! Hahahahahahha just stohohop! Ahahahahaahahahahaha! Pleheheasehahahahaha!" You throw your head back, every muscle straining against the strapping, laughter bursting from you like water from behind a shattered damn.

Her stern glare with her green eyes makes you gulp and shut up "good foxy, now Maizy you know the rules whoever wins gets the patient". As they prepare to play, you watch and wait to see who's the victor.

1442.content:
You're a female panther (a panthress? Panther woman?). At any rate, you have a tall, lithe, athletic form. You are well muscled, but slender, with a feline grace about you. You've always prided yourself on your predatory heritage, always in control of any given situation. Short, black fur covers your entire body, with a pair of golden yellow cat eyes. Quite the beauty.

But as you wake up groggily, you realize that this time you're not in control of the situation like usual. You find yourself on some kind of bed, a hospital bed at that. You're slightly elevated, the bed tilts at the waist. Perhaps you were in some kind of accident? But even stranger than being in some hospital room on a bed... you realize your limbs are tied. Your legs are spread to the corners of the bed, and your feet are tied to some kind of harness at the corners. Your arms are above your head, tied tightly. Despite your best efforts and all your strength, you can't seem to move, tied too tightly. A quiet growl emanates from you, frustrated at the loss of control. The vulnerability. Your body is stretched out, taut on the bed. A thin blanket covers your entire body, but you realize you're not wearing anything underneath. What's going on here?

Before you have a chance to take in your surroundings, you realize there's a noise coming from just outside the door. You can't make it out, but you can tell it's a woman's voice. You can't hear anyone else. Either she's the only one talking, or she's talking to herself. But it's apparent that she's coming into your room. For a moment, panic makes your heart beat quickly. But you calm down, trying to maintain your feline calmness. Your predatory confidence. What to do? You could pretend to be asleep, and see if you can learn anything that way. It might be wise not to be "awake just yet. Or you could be straight-forward and talk with whoever is coming into the room. Surely this must be some mistake, and they'll be releasing you from these ridiculous straps? Or, a third option, perhaps you should try with all your might to break out of the straps before the woman comes into the room, able to do whatever she pleases with you. It hasn't worked yet, but now that your fully awake, are the straps really that strong.

As the door opens and you hear the woman entering the room, you make your decision...
1442.title: Panthress

The door creaks open gently -and your head hits the pillow heavily, eyes falling to slits as you struggle to make yourself seem as relaxed as possible. A cool draught rushes in ahead of the oncoming speakers, and you resist the urge to flinch as cold fingers tease under the blanket and along your nude body with almost anthropoid hooliganism. Even the mere movement of your head slamming down, however, makes the blanket shake, and you again resist the urge to scowl as the incline of your body causes it to drift gently down, exposing the barest hint of your full breasts. You hardly resist the pointless urge to try and pull one arm down to protect yourself as you hosts enter.

Turns out the speaker wasn't holding a monologue after all; two young women appear through the doorway, chatting with apparent enthusiasm. Both wear what appears to be a liberal and liberating variety of nurse outfit, judging by the rather immodest aesthetic and –oh, forget it. Those tight, revealing outfits, with their scandalously short skirt hems and taut blouses, could never pass as anything other than a stripper's special hospital theme-wear. On the other hand, at least the duo actually has some clothing, which is a fair bit more than you can say.

Paltry uniforms and age aside, though, the two don't look much alike. The 'nurse' in the lead is clearly a chipmunk. Cute in her way, to be true, but short and, you think, pudgy; a far cry from the graceful lines of your own feline form. A lock of curly amber hair falls over one eye as she looks up at her companion -and that is a measure most sorely needed, given said companion's impressive figure.

A short-furred grizzly bear of a woman returns every line eagerly, blonde hair shifting with every disagreeing headshake. Her statuesque body seems to be in a state of constant war with the confines of her outfit. One paw plucks at the hemline of her skirt with every long step, obviously determined to try and drag the perilously rising fabric down with every step, with mixed results. The curvature of her tumescent breasts, wobbling faintly with every step, show clearly through the tortured fabric of her blouse, and you can only wonder at the strain on that poor middle button.

Before you know it, the pair stands looming over your prostrate form, eyeing every visible inch of it greedily regardless of your protective blanket. You determine to keep still, breathing steady, even as they regard you. Even as the chipmunk runs one claw gently down the inside of your arm, firmly cuffed to the top of the gurney.

Oh no; it tick- No. Breathe. It doesn't feel like anything; it's just one little finger. Breathe. It doesn't tickle. That little nail on the skin in the crook of your elbow doesn't tickle. Not even a little bit, even as it slowly glides its glacial way downwards, making for the prize. Just breathe. Oh-no; it's almost to your taunt and exposed underarm...

"She's so pretty," Muses the damnable rodent, withdrawing her filthy paw not a moment too soon. "This was a fine catch, eh?"

"Couldn't agree more," Says the grizzly bear cheerfully, striding around to the other side, opposing her shorter friend. "I wonder how ticklish she is?"

At the appearance of the dreaded t-word, your tail flickers back and forth under the blankets as if it wants to escape from your doomed body to go hide somewhere else. You breath normally, determined to keep your cool until these two go away. That proposition becomes exponentially more difficult as the bear wiggles a few of her meaty claws over your immobilized sole, poking invitingly out from under the blanket. The foot jerks, secure leather strapping holding the limb in place, and, maddening, a grin slowly smears itself over your muzzle.

"Aw; I think that someone's awake, Giselle." Says the chipmunk sweetly, slowly walking two fingers down your bicep. Each successive poke, closer and closer to the target, is like the pounding of doom's drums inside your horrified mind. "Coochie-coochie-coo!" Her two fingers spider inside your underarm playfully.

"Gah!" You jump up, back snapping up, entire body twisting as only a startled cat's can in a pointless attempt at averting the sadist's amusements. The blanket almost slides off you completely, and you flop back on the gurney in defeat. "Cut that out! Let me out of here!" You snarl, trying to keep both nurses in your sight simultaneously.

" 'Is she ticklish'," Quotes the chipmunk drily. "Well, I'm only a lowly Nurse, Giselle, no true knismalognist, but the preliminary tests would indicate that, yes, the subject does seem to be a mere teensy bit sensitive to touch." As if purely of its own will, her paw reaches out to tease your helpless underarm again.

"Don't! Don't, or I'll bite you!" You bar your impressive teeth at her threateningly -a move somewhat offset by the desperate way your body twists to avoid her impunitive digits as they slowly close in.

"Threaten all you want; you're the one who's tied down." Says the bear smugly, resting both elbows on the bed, head nestled in her paws. One breaks off to wiggle faintly over your padded foot again, making you hiss. Again, the threatening gesture is only undermined by the accompaniment admission of titillation; in this case a small giggle. Before you can retort, the chipmunk takes advantage to poke your underarm dead-centre, eliciting an unlady-like squeal of surprise.

"Eep! Why are you keeping me here?" You glare at them both haughtily, with as much dignity as you can muster. "I demand that you release me!"

"Ah, you really don't know what's going on, do you girl?" The bear laughs, casually starting to roll up the blanket, over a renewed wave of your outraged protests. You button your mouth as the blanket smoothly slides off you, bearing your voluptuous, receptive body to the world -and to the mercies of these two perverts. "C'mon, Dapple, let's..."
14421.title: Pretend to be asleep

15.content: You are a dragon. You suddenly hear footsteps coming towards the room you are in. You could easily break these bonds and escape, but still you are curious as to where you are, and who is holding you prisoner. What do you do?
15.title: Bound Dragon

info.brief_description: Trapped in a hospital of naughty, tickle-mad, bondage-loving, nurses.
info.description:
AIDS Hospital is a strange hospital, full of beautiful, young, sexy, all-female nurses (no doctors or orderlies) that love to caress, seduce, tie-up, tickle, embrace, kiss, grope, and hug their patients. You are a character (either a Pokemon, an Anthro, a Digimon, etc. your choice) who is trapped in AIDS Hospital, and must find a way out or fall prey to the naughty nurses. The choice is up to you. Just a few rules before you begin.

1. No homosexuality (lesbianism is okay)
2. When in a sexual act do not go into visceral detail.
3. The only other characters you can encounter in this hospital are the nurses.

Other than that enjoy!
